title: Redesign of a big design studio logo
content:
We are questioning our boss about the id of his 30 years old company. It

 [‹ Kerning problems with AI](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121105203/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5812 "Go to previous forum topic") [Need help on Page Numbers: Corel Draw ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121105203/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5761 "Go to next forum topic")
author: leoconrado

comments.content:
First of all, I love that the logo is simple which is a good thing. I like the 'bulged' shapes that add distinctiveness to the shapes.   
   
However, the line style makes me think too much about art/drawing, not about a marcomm consultancy.   
   
What I would do to update it: get rid of the drop shadow, make the shapes very clean and sharp, without losing the bulginess.   
   
My $0.02
